WArt + Practicality via AI: Harnessing the Power of Invisible QR Codes

3 min read · 6 hours ago · Autor: Cezary Gesikowski

“Design is not how it looks & feels like. Design is how it works.” —Steve Jobs

The Charm of Invisible QR Codes

Remember QR (Quick Response) codes? They nearly died off if not for the pandemic that enforced touchless interactions between users and service providers and… suddenly the boxy codes were resurrected to become an integral part of our lives, providing quick and efficient sharing of data. But sometimes, the raw aesthetic of a QR code may be a little too ‘techy’ for certain design aspirations. Imagine if we could retain the functionality of QR codes while making them harmonious with our design aesthetics.
